caption: WOW WOW “I am not worthy of SUCH MAGNIFICENT PIZZA.”   Thor voice  🤣🤣
Great Sicilian pie. Will definitely order again

Our curiosity was peaked from the reviews, so we decided to try the Margherita... it took us 20 minutes to get home, and I can say without exaggeration that even cold, the pizza was excellent. I'm usually not a fan of undercooked sauce, however, this place managed to find the correct balance in perfecting the recipe. The sauce is in perfect balance with the cheese and a perfect crust. Complimenti! Definitely will return.
Solid, cheap cheese pies.

Maybe I caught them on a bad night but worst pizza I've had in NY in the last two years. We ordered delivery. Two pies: Pizza a la Pala which had a crust that could break my teeth. It had no sauce and the despite having plenty of arugula and prosciutto, the texture was dry and flavors were bland. The round salmae pizza tasted like pizza hut. Not likely I'll try this spot again.
Delicious mushroom pizza.

Yes!  Awesome and authentic.  The perfect crisp crust.  Delicate balance of tomato sauce, cheese and toppings on the abruzzese.  Only one small not: with just a touch of additional salt, the flavors just popped.  Also, while not traditional and authentic, but still incredibly delicious, the chicken parm calzone was awesome.  It travelled better than the pizza.  There is a little extra dough on the ends, but that’s what you expect from a calzone.  Bravo!

Delicious pizza and sandwiches and very nice owners. I especially like the Roma sandwich. I haven't tried the pasta yet because the pizza and sandwiches are so good 😋 Update: They sell cannoli! Filled to order!
Some of the best authentic pizza in NYC.
Awesome staff and delicious pizza
Best Pizza in Brooklyn - if not New York!
This place is fantastic. More understated than Sauce in the East Village or Paulie Gee's in green point but its right up there with them as far as quality goes.  Great Slice!
All I can say is "wow " delicious, great crust, and the sauce is out of this world!!! I will be back .
Wow . Excellent  pizza .
Love this place, pizza it's amazing and service off the charts!!👍
Horrible experience, I hope I do not get sick from the meatball parm I order it smelled a bit off and tasted horrible. I will never order from this place again!
Pizza taste amazing. So much 8 noight some sauce n dough for home which they also sell!!
Best slice ive ever had
I walked by this place and decided to grab two cheese slices....BEST PIZZA I'VE EVER HAD!!! The sauce was delicious, the crust was perfectly toasted. I can't wait to go back and have another slice!!!
We've been ordering from here at least twice a month for over a year and it's been fantastic every time - incredible pizza and really wonderful people. try the Diavola pie!
The best pizza in BK

FINALLY! Great pizza in the best part of Park Slope. These guys actually care. I don’t know why so many other pizzerias in the neighborhood have such low standards for their quality? They do it right! My go to (aside from the amazing pizza) is the chicken parm which NEVER disappoints. Perfect amount of sauce and cheese! Keep doing your thing guys, I’m rooting for you!
Great pizza! Homemade pizza kits are awesome.
Fast service. Delicious pizza!
I am so happy I live next door. Best pizza in Brooklyn! Very clean place and polite service.
Great slice shop. A must go for pizza seekers in the north slope.
Why can’t all pizza taste this incredible!!?! 😩❤️

Just got my first order from here and was blown away. Probably the best and most authentic Sicilian pizza I’ve had in NYC — typically the ones I get are good, but pretty crusty and just thick regular pizza dough. This Sicilian was so thick that you will likely get some sauce on your face as you bite into it, but it’s still so airy and light. No chewing and ripping it off. The salami picante we added on was delicious and there was enough for every bite. The sauce was simple and delicious as was the mozzarella. I could not in good conscious order pizza from anywhere else.
Delicious!!! Thin , light but with lots of flavor. Great Pizza!!!

Polite service, almost like family, even in the way they greet you. Accept credit/debit cards, no limit, so I can get my slice! Hardcore Italians working the ovens. So I really taste the authenticity. My favorite pizza place. I also love their eggplant parmesan.

Worst pizza ever, Tasted so watery very soggy, No taste, sauce is watery and not tastey not enough cheese !  I asked for a refund they didnt want to accept the refund ! Dont go to this place $17 for the worst pizza ever!
The reviews are legit. This place is just that good. The sauce — oh man, it is so subtle and fresh. Man this has got to be the best pizza I have ever had. Do yourself a favor and try it!
Simple review: this is the best pizza our family has experienced outside of Italy.
Excellent new pizza shop, super fresh ingredients and friendly people. Great margherita pizza and eggplant parm sub

I've ordered from L'Arte a number of times and the pizza is superb. I personally enjoy the thin crust that is cooked perfectly, the sauce is not overly acidic and very well-balanced. And their delivery time is always sooner than expected. Most recently, the arugula I ordered as an added topping was accidentally left off and when I called the restaurant to just make them aware, they offered to refund me the $2, which I refused (cuz it's two bucks). But they refunded it anyway! Great pizza, great delivery time and great customer service. I enthusiastically recommend!
High quality pizza that reminds me of my travels in Italy.
(Translated by Google) Very friendly people !!! Pizza is ok  (Original) Sehr freundliche Menschen!!! Pizza ist in Ordnung
The BEST Pizza in Brooklyn!!
Went there yesterday very good guy from Italy nothing &  delicious regular pie and everything there delicious Awesome pizza 8.2
I love this place, and the people that work there. Great pizza, and sandwiches. 😘

Very good authentic Roman style pizza. The pizza was light with a wonderful tomato sauce.  I would have preferred the Romana pie to have a bit more cheese, but I still enjoyed it.  The owner was very friendly and chatted with my friend and I about his pizza and Italy. This man knows pizza and it shows.
Fantastic pizza. The sauce is perfect. The ingredients are excellent and the crust is thin and amazing!!  Definitely recommend L’Arte Della Pizza Brooklyn!! 👍🏻
best in town
The best. Can't find another place where you can get a slice this high quality.
Great service
Delicious

L’Arte was recommended by my sister-in-law. I wasn’t disappointed. I’ve had their food several times and it’s been consistently excellent. There’s a wide variety of dishes to choose from and so far all of my choices have been terrific. I’m a big fan of eggplant Parmesan and I’ve enjoyed it immensely.
We ordered salad, pizza and eggplant parmigiana - really delicious !

I flew in from Canada and heard about this place. The chef/owner is from Italy and it explains why the pizza is exactly like in italy. It does  not get more authentic than this. The sauce is imported and every bite is just perfect. The buffalo mozzarella is top shelf and not to mention there menu has quite a selection of Italian dishes such as pasta, panini, Italian rice balls. I cant wait to return 👍👍👍👍👍

This is an amazing slice. Its one of the best slices I've had in NYC and its comparable to slices I've had while traveling in Italy. Fresh quality ingredients and awesome customer service. Must eat is the buffalo mozzarella but all his slices are a step above the rest. If i could give it 6 stars or more I would. BEST PIZZA IN PARK SLOPE
Delicious 👍
Chicken Cutlet Parmigiani Hero not quality chicken, very soggy bread, skimpy on the mozzarella cheese
The worst pizza I ever tasted . Sauce was had no tatse . And it seemed like it had no cheese on it and smelled like throw up. Warning don't waste your time or money. Garbage .

The Pizza was amazing.  Authentic all natural ingredients.  Riccardo and Leo were the best hosts ever.  This is definitely my new spot.  I strongly recommend the dinner for those evenings when working late.  Worked for us.  Wish their beverage selection had a larger assortment.  The menu is excellent and food was delicious.
The pizza is amazing!  We live in the Columbia Waterfront & will be ordering from here again and again!!
Ottimo! NY style has its place but this is Italian pizza.
(Translated by Google) Best wishes....  (Original) Auguri....

If you want an authentic Italian pizza, this is the place to go! The pizza is the best I've had for years! The pizzas are to die for and the staff are so nice and friendly! They not only have authentic Italian pizza they also have authentic Italian hospitality! Great place to experience the best of Italy in Brooklyn!
Great addition to the neighborhood! We had a margarita pie and the baby kale butternut squash salad. Both were tasty with fresh ingredients. The space is a gem and the people are super friendly.
Has the best pizza I have ever had! It’s real Italian pizza and now it’s my new favorite place to go eat!

Better than any other slice in the neighborhood, and maybe even the best I've had in Brooklyn. The marinara sauce on their mozzarella pizza is absolutely delicious and the crust has always been baked to perfection the few times that I've been here. Reader, check this place out.
Our new favourite spot for pizza. We love the light, crisp crusts and freshly made toppings. They’re exactly what we’ve been looking for! And the staff are lovely too.

The closest thing to getting on a plane for a pizza in Italy is going here. Sauce is perfect. Crust is light and crispy. I love that they make different crusts and enjoy waiting to see what the Pizza Chef creates.

Traveled back to Italy!! The pizza is just like in a piazza in Italy. You know how you always throw the ends out of a pizza crust? Not here! Devoured the whole piece and took a pie home too. Worth the visit!
Best Pizza in Brooklyn BY FAR !!!!! And not only pizza!
Love their pizza. Great taste and very well priced.
Just loved their pizza! You now don't have to travel to Italy to get an authentic slice!
The pizza looks and tastes delicious. The staff is attentive and friendly.  Definitely worth the trip from Queens.
